text: Marlon Lamont Wayans (born July 23, 1972) is an American actor, producer, comedian, writer, and director. He is known for his roles in Scary Movie, White Chicks, Requiem for a Dream, Little Man, and in A Haunted House. Wayans was born in New York City.Stein, Joel. (September 11, 2000) Marlon Wayans . TIME.
